message: I think 60-40 is a fair split, considering the money loses value each round.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to take a bit more. 70-30 seems fair now.
I'll accept a 70-30 split this time, but I'm not sure I can afford to keep going much longer with the inflation. Let's get this done.

Given your last offer was essentially a return to my first proposal and considering the significant impact of inflation on your potential gain, I'm willing to take a firmer stance. 80-20 seems appropriate at this stage.
